General.Name: Dalian Sunasia Tourism Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Dalian Sunasia Tourism Holding CO.,LTD, together with its subsidiaries, operates theme parks in China. It engages in the construction and operation of aquariums, marine exploration artificial landscapes, amusement parks, marine life specimen exhibition halls, and ship model exhibition halls. It is also involved in the catering, commercial performances, aquatic wild animals' domestication and breeding, and national key protected wild animals domestication and breeding activities; and provision of information technology, animal feed sales, photography, and video services, as well as exhibition and display, conferences, marketing planning, advertising, etc. services. In addition, the company offers travel, hotel management, business administration, investment advisory, management consulting, equity investment, public facilities management, and business services. Dalian Sunasia Tourism Holding CO.,LTD was founded in 1993 and is based in Dalian, China.
